about_the_game:
Master Heroes is an advanced Multiplayer First Person Shooter (FPS) game, including all the basics and some advanced systems that all multiplayer shooters requires.

This game framework is very polished and utilizing the latest Unity Game eEngine technologies with high efficiency and performance. Including a professional UI using UGUI, player Mechanism animations, and plenty of options to customize to your taste and needed .
It contains shop to buy coins to use buy new weapons from unity api to buy from iOS .

Utilizing the Photon Unity Networking as network solutions, you have 3 different game modes in the core of the kit: Free for All, Team Death Match and Capture the Flag.

Additionally, there are 4 player classes that you can modify to your taste and 6 different kinds of weapons: Rifle, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenade, and Knife. This kit is AAA Graphics-Ready. You can easily customize your character, level up, enhance weapon and enhance armor.
detailed_description:
Master Heroes is an advanced Multiplayer First Person Shooter (FPS) game, including all the basics and some advanced systems that all multiplayer shooters requires.

This game framework is very polished and utilizing the latest Unity Game eEngine technologies with high efficiency and performance. Including a professional UI using UGUI, player Mechanism animations, and plenty of options to customize to your taste and needed .
It contains shop to buy coins to use buy new weapons from unity api to buy from iOS .

Utilizing the Photon Unity Networking as network solutions, you have 3 different game modes in the core of the kit: Free for All, Team Death Match and Capture the Flag.

Additionally, there are 4 player classes that you can modify to your taste and 6 different kinds of weapons: Rifle, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenade, and Knife. This kit is AAA Graphics-Ready. You can easily customize your character, level up, enhance weapon and enhance armor.
developers: Hedge Technologies for Information Technology LLC

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 4 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

name: Master Heroes

  • OS: 10

  • OS: 11

  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 10
